name: gkiyo
text: A comment left by gkiyo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, robobogle, farqussus, NDCaesar, Doc_Rostov)

name: farqussus
text: A comment left by farqussus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt2, RedMange, LordPretzel, lastlarf, pquinn87)

name: lastlarf
text: Back in the day, there weren't none ofem... faaaancy "Alt Texts" on the assetbarrrr. Folks such as gkiyo was pro-vidin' yew a service, lad.

name: goocifer
text: This post makes me want another option:  Chubby, Lame, and ...huh?

name: farqussus
text: I am here to apologise for being an alt text posting fascist. You will find me being a prick about it in posts to come. I apologise in advance.

name: jollysaintpete
text: chubby for your humility, prick!

name: lolsworth
text: Atonement chubby.

name: goocifer
text: What I meant was, was lastlarf supposed to be a pirate or a 18th century prospector or scottish or a cowboy or just southern or what is that accent.

name: farqussus
text: You tell us, Sam Beckett

name: applebed
text: You need to put 'West Country accent' into Youtube, my lovely.

name: mortshire
text: ha, the monolith wears beach thongs. of course.

name: aperson
text:
'The Monolith'?
That's plankbot. Ole planky.

name: ghostd
text: Ah, Vlad, the robot with the bear gut.

name: ghostd
text: beer gut, not bear gut. Gah.

name: spanntastic
text: GAAAAAAAAH!

name: deusoma
text: Which brings up memories of a specific Far Side about a fat bear's "deer gut."

name: wharfrat
text: robots in devolpment

name: deancain29
text: The first appearance of chucklebot!

name: hereward
text:
Sorry I lamed you, I meant to chubby! omg!

I was thinking the same thing. Which is remarkably un-special a thing to think, but IT NEEDED TO BE SAID.

name: sargasm
text: Robots have really nice shoes.

name: tetrisattack
text: The new strips need more of the robots

name: darkwaffle
text: My favorite part was when I chuckled when Chucklebot spoke

name: straw
text: I chuckle every time I read it.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "CHUCKLE BOT" Note the spelling variation.

name: nutmeg
text:
man chucklebot's introduction always makes me chuckle.

after this he gets ten kinds of creepy, but that's alright.

name: bhlaab
text: Andy is the best character

name: chrissketch
text: Where are you now Andy? Have you found what you were looking for when you left us?

name: rowboat
text: I haven't seen him since the night he took those bong rips with Ray and Téodor. He's probably wearing a newspaper suit on a German sidewalk or something.

name: professorhazard
text: Did Andy ever speak again after this comic?

name: fineoakstructure
text: Yes, remember when Vlad was mad that Andy wouldn't come to the sports bar?

name: ohmygooses
text: man, I really miss chuckle bot :(

name: bilingualmonkey
text: I don't know why, but I fucking love Chucklebot

name: baryonyx
text: Enter the giant apocalyptic machinery.

name: hateandwar
text: Vlad, the Make-Out King

name: tekende
text:
Just the name Chucklebot is making me laugh right now. There's something really hilarious about it.

Also, I imagine he has a monotonized, distorted, computer-y voice but it's really high-pitched.

name: cbtbone
text: There's something inherently funny about Robots telling jokes.

name: rachel
text: oh my god thank you for this thank you for this

name: snapdragon
text: chubbied for robot bias, Transformer.

name: notcool
text: I have always, and always shall, hear Chucklebot as a talkbox, like you'd hear Frampton use. Now try NOT hearing Chucklebot like that and tell me I'm right or not.

name: thesoulbear
text: Whatever happened to Andy? You never see him down at the Sullen Solenoid.

name: sleepyhead
text: vlad is an out of work kgb bot

name: tommythebrat
text: In an alternative universe the comic's major storylines all revolve around these three musketeers instead of the three cats.

name: carlyle
text:
Hence my least favorite character came to be.

CHUCKLEBOT.

name: fineoakstructure
text: homophobe

name: puguglypress
text: He just doesn't want him teaching in his schools.

name: carlyle
text:
I was hasty in my youth. Allow me to retract.

Dear Chucklebot, sorry I offended you. From Carlyle.

name: origotoshi
text:
That "Since I made you chuckle that is" reminds me of a personalized version of "that's what she said."

First time through the comic though, so it remains to be seen for me if he says that a lot...
